**Required**

Read:

- [R and RStudio Installation and Setup](https://zief0002.github.io/modeling/01-01-r-and-rstudio-installation.html) [*Statistical Modeling*]

Install R and RStudio:

- Download and install the most recent version of [R (version 4.3.1; *Beagle Scouts*)](https://www.r-project.org/) on your computer.
- Download and install the most recent version of and [RStudio Desktop (version 2023.06.0+421)](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) on your computer. 


Read and work through the following:

- [Getting Started with R](https://zief0002.github.io/modeling/01-02-getting-started-with-r.html) [*Statistical Modeling*]
- [Data Structures in R](https://zief0002.github.io/modeling/01-03-data-structures-in-r.html) [*Statistical Modeling*]


**Additional Resources**

- [RStudio Cheatsheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/)
